sentence.Network_en: Skateboarding gives one the extreme sense of cheerfulness and success.
sentence.Network_cn: 滑板能够给予人在跨越心理承受极限时获得极大的愉悦感和成就感.

sentence.Network_en: These are only a few reasons why skateboarding is so popular.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些只是滑板之所以如此流行的一部分原因.

sentence.Network_en: The city passed a statute forbidding skateboarding in parks.
sentence.Network_cn: 该市通过[公园禁止溜冰]的法令.

entry.def: Skateboarding is the activity of riding on a skateboard.

means.word_mean: 1. the sport of skating on a skateboard
